answer.text: It`s a platform where you can create online-services for crypto trading.
It`s a crowdfunding tool, that can be described as an entry in data register.
It`s an internal currency that can be described as an entry in data register.

body.text: Which word isn`t just a car brand, but also a term from trading?

answer.text: Chrysler
Fiat
Datsun
Audi

body.text: Blockchain-based game CryptoKitties became popular last autumn. What is the main objective of the game?

answer.text: To wait until the cat meows, which means that it conducted a transaction for some users.
Expensive pure-bred cats are used as a bail by their owners to get cryptocurrency Myuuuchain.
To record funny cat videos. Some people are ready to pay cryptocurrency in return for the best videos.
To grow virtual cats, that can be bought and sold for cryptocurrency.
You will be able to pay with cryptocurrency starting from 2020. For now, it`s just a potential payment method.
Everywhere!
Online and in some advanced places.
Sadly, only in the darknet.

body.text: Cryptocurrency world borrowed one of their terms from agriculture. Which one?

answer.text: Compost
Pasture
Plantation
Farm
